Subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Re: To use registered media-types or not?

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

*Anyway, this was a side note, maybe we should not disperse and stick to
this thread question, when using HTTP over the public Internet
infrastructure, **to be** RESTfull we MAY use non-IANA registered
media-types, or on the contrary, to be RESTfull one MUST stick to those **IANA
registered media-types?*

--000feaeadea2141c56048fd0f675

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
